description: Make your own tartare sauce with this irresistable recipe. Perfectly tart and creamy, pair it with fresh prawns or fish and chips for the ultimate seafood feast.
keywords: Tartare,Pescatarian,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Dec 2020
name: Easy Tartare Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs baby capers, drained, roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Place mayonnaise, capers, zest and lemon juice, and dill in a small bowl. Season and stir until well combined. Sprinkle with extra dill and capers, then serve with prawns and lemon wedges.
